xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Wiki Index ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Delete wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=Wikis
## Dependencies ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=The "Wiki" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki API" and "Wiki Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).

Please retry your operation.
## Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is already a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is not a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=In order to continue, you need to {0}log in{1} first. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=Bruger ''{0}'' ({1}) har accepteret invitation til at deltage i arbejdsområde ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=Bruger {0}{1}{2} har accepteret invitationen og er medlem i arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=Bruger {0}{1}{2} afviste invitationen til arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=Deltagelse i dette arbejdsområde er kun efter invitation. For at deltage skal du modtage en invitation fra en af administratorerne. platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=Bruger {0}{1}{2} har allerede en ansøgning liggende til arbejdsområdet {3}{4}{5}. Vent venligst på at en administrator behandler det. platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Er du sikker på du vil slette ønsket om optagelse i arbejdsområde {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Ja platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=Nej platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=Bruger {0}{1}{2} har trukket sit ønske om optagelse i arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5} tilbage. platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=Bruger ''{0}'' ({1}) ønsker medlemskab i arbejdsområde ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=Bruger {0}{1}{2} har sendt ansøgning om medlemskab i arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Er du sikker på du vil deltage i arbejdsområde {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Ja platform.wiki.users.join.no=Nej platform.wiki.users.join.success=Bruger {0}{1}{2} er blevet medlem i arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5}. platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=Bruger {0}{1}{2} er ejer af arbejdsområde {3}{4}{5}. Ejeren af et arbejdsområde må ikke forlade det før det enten er slettet eller at en ny ejer er angivet. platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Er du sikker på du vil forlade arbejdsområde {0}{1}{2}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Yes platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=Nej ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully left wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.title=Join Wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Leave Wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Delete Wiki "{0}" platform.wiki.users.delete.empty= platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=Et besked som svar, som administratorer kan læse og hvor i du kan begrunde din beslutning. platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=For at deltage i arbejdsområde {0}{1}{2}, skal du først oprette en ansøgning. Derefter vil en administrator læse ans platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=Besked som arbejdsområde-administorer kan læse og hvori du kan motivere din ansøgning. platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=Du er inviteteret til at deltage i arbejdsområde {0}{1}{2}. platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Invitationsbesked platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Svar platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Accept platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Afvis ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Later ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Message ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Send Request ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Back

## Wizard ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=The domain name that will point to the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Template to use for this new wiki (all pages will be cloned). ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=A user who will always have all the rights on this wiki, independent of the rights configured in the Administration. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=The users who can participate in the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Step 1 — Choose a name ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Name ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Step 2 — Choose members ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Cleaning Up ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Clean & delete this wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=The wiki {0} has been successfuly deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Error, the wiki {0} has not been deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=You are about to delete wiki {0}. Please confirm. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Confirm ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=This wiki will be a template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=No template (default) ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=User Scope ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Select what kind of users can access the wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Flavor / Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Flavor or Template to use as the initial content of the new wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Flavor ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=After clicking on the "Create" button, the wiki will be created and the Distribution Wizard will be started in order to help you initialize your wiki. If you skip the wizard, your wiki will be empty. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Previous Step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Next step ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Create
### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki creation ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Please wait until the wiki is created. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=The wiki {0} has been successfully created. You can now access it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=The wiki {0} has been created but some pages have not been installed. ## Admin ### Missing: admin.wikis.description=Wikis management. ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates=Wiki Templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. ### Missing: admin.wikis.rights=Creation Right

For more configurations, please go to the ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=administration page of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.
